title: HARS Instructions | Honors College | University of Illinois at Chicago
text: Honors Activity Agreement Forms
All Honors College students must complete an honors activity each fall and spring semester. Honors activities may be conducted during summer session.

In addition to registering for HON 222 (most activities) or HON 322 (Capstone), students must also complete an Agreement Form at the beginning of each semester and submit a printed copy to the Honors College offices.

Please select the Honors Activity you are undertaking this semester and you will be directed to the appropriate agreement form. More information about the options for Honors Activities can be found here.
For my Honors Activity this semester I am:

Check with your fellow about other imaginative ideas for fulfilling your semester honors activity in ways that don’t fit the categories above. You can use the other activities form to declare your activity for the semester.

A step-by-step guide to submitting all paper work associated with your Honors Activity. This process does not include information for those completing their Capstone. For Capstone information click here.
Honors Activity Agreement Form Instructions
To be completed at the beginning of each semester for which you are seeking Honors Activity credit. You should also be registered for HON 222.
Honors Activity Completion Form Instructions
To be completed at the end of each semester where a subsequent Agreement Form was submitted.

Did you lose your one of your forms? If you lost any of your printed forms, you DO NOT need to create a new one. A copy of your original form can be found on the HARS website. Follow the instructions below:

A step-by-step guide to submitting all paper work associated with your Honors College Capstone. This process does not include information for those completing other Honors Activities. For Honors Activity information click here.
Capstone Agreement Form Instructions
To be completed at the beginning of the semester in which you are starting work on your Capstone. You should also be registered for HON 322.
Capstone Progress Report Form Instructions
To be completed at the end of the semester in which you submitted your Capstone Agreement Form.
Capstone Progress Update Form Instructions
To be completed at the beginning of the semester for which you are continuing work on your Capstone. You should also be registered for HON 322.
Capstone Completion Form Instructions
To be completed at the end of the semester in which you submitted your Capstone Progress Update. This form should only be submitted when your Capstone has been completed.
